about_the_game:
Your mind is a mess and only a feeling of being hunted remains. You must escape.

Losted is a first person survival horror. A game about immersion, discovery and living through a nightmare. An experience that will chill you to the core.

Explore...
Losted puts you in a desolate castle, barely remembering anything about your past. Exploring the eerie pathways, you must also take part of troubled memories. The horror does not only come from the outside, but from the inside as well. A disturbing odyssey into the dark corners of the human mind awaits.

Experience...
By using a fully physically simulated world, cutting edge 3D graphics and a dynamic sound system, the game pulls no punches when trying to immerse you.

Survive...
Losted throws you headfirst into a dangerous world where danger can lurk behind every corner. Your only means of defense are hiding, running or using your wits.

What's waiting for you:
Classic Survival Horror gameplay
Multiple Enemies
Adventures
Crafting Items
Gathering Resources
Puzzle
Tasks
Collecting items

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Scenes of violence or violence, Adult content

name: Losted

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core I7 2600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060 3gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core I7 4770k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You wakes up in an old castle and cannot even remember your name. What is the year now? What kind of place is it? How to get home? There are so many questions, the answers to which can only be found by solving the many cunning mysteries of this mysterious place...
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
